units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

units.name: Viper
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Seer
units.prompt: Use foresight early to give your team intel. Target enemy specters with mind_spike to break cloak. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

player.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

opponent.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.
